songs.title: Proof
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
So I waited for you
What wouldn't I do?
And I'm covered, it's true
I'm covered in you
If I ever want proof
I find it in you
Yeah I honestly do
In you I find proof

[Chorus]
Light and dark
A bright spark
Light and dark
And then, light

[Verse 2]
So I waited all day
What wouldn't I say?
And are there things in your way?
Things happen that way
Oh
And if I ever want proof
Then I find it in you
Oh
Yeah I honestly do
In you I find proof

[Chorus]
Light and dark
A bright spark
Light and dark
And then, light
Light [x4]
